archimate:Product.name: VirusTotal Graph
archimate:Product.documentation:
VirusTotal Graph: an information aggregator: the data presented is the combined output of different antivirus products, file and website characterization tools, website scanning engines and datasets, and user contributions. VirusTotal is a free service but you can not upload your own data. at https://www.virustotal.com/#/graph-overview
Very specific usage (Security analysis for Virus/Malware) with a specific usage of graphs, an illustration use case of graph technologies
